name: Make Tree Big
description:
I made this from 3:30 - 6:45 am on Tuesday, December 10.

You press the key that comes up on the screen, the tree gets bigger. Only very slightly.

Wait a while, and another key will come up. There's no sound to alert you of this. You better be checking back to the window frequently.

Shoutout to my friend and designer in crime, Jarrod Ehlert for helping me to really push my creative boundaries with this one. It's been an unforgettable 2.25 hours of personal growth. Also to another dear friend, Chris Onorati, for compiling all these keyboard icons in one convenient package I use for all my monstrosities.

And to you ;)
